name: Rick
line: Run!

name: Summer
line: *incoherent zombie noises*

name: Rick
line: Morty,

name: Morty
line: I can’t

name: Rick
line: *holding

name: Beth
line: Morty,

name: Morty
line: Ohhhh…

name: Rick
line: Good

name: Rick
line: *holding

name: Rick
line: You

name: Morty
line: I just

name: Rick
line: I dunno,

name: Morty
line: Y-You

name: Rick
line: Whoa

name: Morty
line: *pushes

name: Rick
line: Oh yeah,

name: Rick
line: Okay,

name: Morty
line: Okay, all right, tough guy! But if my adventure's good... I get to be in charge of every third adventure!

name: Rick
line: Every 10th.

name: Morty
line: Deal. All right. Well, come on, let's get going.

name: Beth
line: Dad, the dishwasher's doing that thing again.

name: Rick
line: Washing dishes?

name: Beth
line: No. The opposite. Can you fix it?

name: Summer
line: Grandpa Rick, can you help me with my science homework?

name: Rick
line: Yeah just don't do it.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa!

name: Jerry
line: [amazed] Wow!

name: Beth
line: So many possibilities.

name: Summer
line: My mind is racing.

name: Jerry
line: If we're gonna use this thing, which I'm not even sure we should, we need to keep it simple.

name: Meeseeks
line: I'm Mr. Meeseeks!

name: Summer
line: I want to be popular at school!

name: Meeseeks
line: Ooh, okay!

name: Jerry
line: Summer, what did I just-

name: Meeseeks 2
line: Ooh, I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me!

name: Beth
line: I want I want to be a more complete woman!

name: Jerry
line: Beth!

name: Meeseeks 2
line: Oh, yeah! Yes, ma'am!

name: Jerry
line: You guys are doing it wrong. He said "simple."

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Hey, there. I'm Mr. Meeseeks!

name: Jerry
line: Mr. Meeseeks, I would like to take two strokes off my golf game.

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Ooh, yeah! Can do!

name: Jerry
line: Nailed it.

name: Rick
line: God, Morty, what a boring start to an adventure. Why didn't we just go to Kentucky?

name: Morty
line: Rick, this is a fantasy-type world with creatures and all sorts of fantasy things. We're going on a quest, okay?

name: Rick
line: Can't wait.

name: Morty
line: Ahem. Excuse me! We are two humble heroes in search of adventure!

name: Rick
line: Oh, my God, so embarrassing.

name: Villager (man)
line: At last! Two heroes! You must help us! This village is terribly poor, yet the giant that lives in the clouds above has untold treasures!

name: Morty
line: You know what? I accept your call to adventure, good sir, kind sir. Come on, Rick. There's a giant in the clouds!

name: Rick
line: Yeah. Beginner's luck.

name: Meeseeks 1
line: In conclusion, a friendship with Summer Smith is the most valuable and enriching experience of your young lives. I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me! Thank you!

name: Principal Gene V.
line: Uh, Mr. Meeseeks, was it? Yeah. Gene Vagina. Listen, I'm in a bit of custody thing with my ex and was wondering- (Meeseeks 1 stops existing)- No, I'll get your info from Summer.

name: Beth
line: I got pregnant at 17. I mean, I still put myself through veterinary school. Yes, I'm successful, but what if I hadn't...-(Meeseeks 2 stares attentively)- I'm just saying, somewhere along the way, I lost that wide-eyed girl from muskegon.

name: Meeseeks 2
line: She's still there, Beth.

name: Beth
line: Well, her waistline isn't.

name: Meeseeks 2
line: Beth, having a family doesn't mean that you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for people that depend on you? Be honest with them, even if it means setting them free.

name: Beth
line: You're saying I should leave Jerry. (Beth starts to cry) I can't believe I'm finally having this conversation.

name: Waiter (man)
line: More wine?

name: Beth
line: I think I've had enough.

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Remember to square your shoulders, Jerry.

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, yeah. I got it.

name: Meeseeks 3
line: That's okay. I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me! Try again and keep your head down.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, well, which is it? Square my shoulders or keep my head down?

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Well, it's both. But most importantly, you got to relax.

name: Jerry
line: You know what, Mr. Meeseeks? I don't think this is working. I give up.

name: Meeseeks 3 (nervous)
line: I'm sorry, Jerry, but it doesn't work like that. I'm Mr. Meeseeks. I have to fulfill my purpose so I can go away. Look at me.

name: Jerry
line: Well, make yourself comfortable, because I suck.

name: Meeseeks 3
line: No, Jerry, I'm the one who SUCKS! Let me try something.

name: Meeseeks 4
line: I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me!

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Hi, Mr. Meeseeks! I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me.

name: Meeseeks 4
line: Hi!

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Can you help me get two strokes off of Jerry's golf swing?

name: Meeseeks 4
line: Can do! I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Is he keeping his shoulders squared?

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Ooh, he's trying!

name: Rick
line: All right, Morty. We're in your stupid giant's castle. What do we do next?

name: Morty
line: Would you just relax, Rick? All we got to do is find the treasure room, okay? It's nice and simple. You know, I'm sorry everything's going so smoothly and adventurously.

name: Rick (sarcastic)
line: Uh-oh, Morty. Startin' to get a little hairy. What do you want to do, boss?

name: Morty
line: Come on, hurry. Behind this cookie jar.

name: Giant
line: Fee! Fi! Fo! Fum!

name: Rick
line: Just give up, Morty. This is game over. I'll take us home right now. You just say the word.

name: Morty
line: No way, Rick. This is all part of it. Adventures have conflict. Deal with it.

name: Giant
line: I smell the blood of- whoop!(the giant falls and cracks his head open on the table corner before hitting the ground)

name: Morty
line: Holy crap.

name: Rick
line: Oh, boy. He looks pretty bad down there, Morty. Looks like he's bleeding out.

name: Giant woman
line: Oh, Jesus! Dale! You sons of bitches! Oh, man. Hello, 911? My husband has been attacked by tiny people! He's dying!

name: Detective
line: Hey, look, we get it. You're little, you're down on your luck, you think, "hey, he's a giant. Why don't we break into his home, rob him, and murder him?"

name: Morty
line: Th-th but that's not how it went down!

name: Detective
line: Oh, well, it's going down like that. You're both going down like that.

name: Rick
line: Ooh, boy, Morty, you're really showing me how it's done. Real straightforward and fun.

name: Summer
line: Like, letting go of the need to be popular is what makes people like you.

name: Beth
line: The most important love you can receive is from yourself.

name: Meeseeks
line: Okay, Jerry, you got to just choke up on the club!

name: Jerry
line: Well, which is it, choke up or follow-through?!

name: Meeseeks
line: Aww, come on, Jerry, we've been over this. You know you got to do both! This is as frustrating for us as it is for you.

name: Jerry
line: Don't tell me that! That just puts pressure on me!

name: Meeseeks
line: Just try to relax.

name: Jerry
line: You try to relax! Have you ever tried to relax?! It is a paradox! (Jerry walks to the dinning room)

name: Beth
line: Our Meeseeks have been gone for hours, Jerry.

name: Jerry
line: You're kidding me.

name: Beth
line: Notice anything different?

name: Jerry
line: I'm sorry. Hours?

name: Summer
line: Dad, mom is a beautiful woman! Look at her! You will lose her!

name: Meeseeks
line: Uhh... Hey, Jerry, you mind if we get back to the task at hand? Meeseeks don't usually have to exist this long. It's getting weird.

name: Judge
line: Order in the court! Before the jury reaches its verdict, I just want to say that I consider you both very guilty.

name: Rick (sarcastic)
line: Oh, great adventure, buddy. Rick and Morty go to giant prison. You know, if somebody drops the soap, it's gonna land on our heads and crush our spines, Morty. You know, it'll be really easy to rape us after that.

name: Morty
line: We're gonna be okay, Rick.

name: Rick
line: How? They took my portal gun. This is an open-and-shut case, Morty. You know, what do you think's gonna happen, some magical angel's gonna show up and then-(the court doors burst open and a giant in a suit walks down the isle.)

name: Giant Lawyer
line: Fee! Fi! Fo! Fum! I smell the violation of civil liberties! Your honor, I'm from a tiny-persons advocacy group and I have here in my hand a motion to dismiss. These little men were never read their giant rights and are therefore free-fi to fo-home.

name: Rick
line: W-what the hell is he talking about?

name: Giant Lawyer
line: They're free to go, is what I meant. I'm deconstructing our our our thing we say. We're giants. Nobody got that? Whatever.

name: Morty
line: Oh, man, what did I tell you, Rick? We did it!

name: Rick
line: All right, Morty, looks like the portal gun's still working. You ready to head home?

name: Morty
line: Oh, yeah, you'd like that, wouldn't you, Rick? Well, you know what? We're not bailing out just yet. You know, we're gonna go find some treasure or something and and we're gonna bring it to those villagers.

name: Rick
line: Morty, cut your losses. This is obviously awash.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, you were saying that back when we first got arrested, but here we are, you know, walking down the courthouse steps.

name: Rick
line: Oh, boy, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Usually, walking down the courthouse steps is the easy part of the adventure.

name: Rick
line: What do you say, Morty?

name: Morty
line: I say give me a hand, sidekick.

name: NOTE
line: to make this easier an * will be put next to meeseeks every time a different meeseeks talks.

name: Jerry
line: Everybody shut up! Let me try! (Jerry swings and misses again) Damn it! Damn it! Damn it!

name: Beth
line: I'm going out.

name: Jerry
line: Wait. What?

name: Beth
line: Well, you're busy. I'm hungry. I thought I'd go out. Do you want me to be happy or do you want me to be in prison?

name: Jerry
line: Whoa, whoa, where in the hell is, I'll take you to dinner.

name: All the Meeseeks
line: AWWWWWWW!

name: Jerry
line: Hey, you know what? It's hard being me, too. I'll be right there. Look, I've got a marriage to keep together. At this point, my golf swing is more your problem than mine.

name: Meeseeks
line: I can't take it anymore. I just want to die!

name: Meeseeks *
line: We all want to die! We're Meeseeks! Why did you even rope me into this?

name: Meeseeks *
line: 'Cause he roped me into this!

name: Meeseeks *
line: Well, him over there, he roped me into this!

name: Meeseeks *
line: Well, what about me? He roped me into this.

name: Meeseeks *
line: Well, that one over there roped me into this.

name: Meeseeks *
line: Well, he roped me into this.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, Morty, this is the part of the story everybody loves scaling down 650,000 oversized steps.

name: Morty
line: All right, okay, you know, if this was a story, this part wouldn't be included, stupid.

name: Morty
line: Oh, wow, Rick. Now, this is more like it. Look, there's little staircase-shaped people in here. All kinds of crazy characters. This place is great, you know? It's whimsical and fun.

name: Rick
line: What are you looking at, motherfucker?

name: Morty
line: Easy, Rick.

name: Waitress
line: Pay them no mind. Those stair goblins can be moody. Now, what can I getcha? We've got skarlog poppies, flurlow, halzingers, bloogies, juicy time babies.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, yeah, yeah, how about some scotch whiskey? You got any of that around here? Or just a bunch of nonsense words?

name: Morty
line: Rick... We'll have two bloogies, please. And, uh, we were wondering, is there a faster way two heroes could get down these stairs?

name: Slippery
line: Y'all need to ride down the stairs? My name is slippely-slippery stair. I'll take you down there for 25 shmeckels.

name: Rick
line: 25 shmeckels? I don't know how much I don't know what that is. Is that a lot? Is it a little?

name: Waitress
line: That's exactly how much I spent on my big fake boobies.

name: Mr. Booby Buyer
line: Hi, I'm Mr. Booby Buyer. I'll buy those boobies for 25 shmeckels.

name: Waitess
line: It's a tempting offer, but I'm gonna have to decline.

name: Mr. Booby Buyer
line: Rats! What a shame.

name: Rick
line: Morty, your adventure's in a spiral. For real, man, time to pull out.

name: Morty
line: You keep heckling my adventure, Rick! You know why?

name: Rick
line: Uh, because it's lame?

name: Morty
line: It's because you're petty! You know, how many times have I had to follow you into some nonsensical bull crap? I always roll with the punches, Rick. Why can't you? Look, I got to take a leak, and when I come back, if you haven't learned how to lighten up, don't be here!

name: Rick
line: Whatever.

name: Meeseeks
line: It's become clear-look at me- that if we concentrate all our efforts on Jerry's follow-through, we will solve this problem. I'm Mr. Meeseeks.

name: Meeseeks *
line: I'm Mr. Meeseeks. Look at me. The only thing that's clear is that choking up is the one true solution.

name: Meeseeks 3
line: Look at me. I'm Mr. Meeseeks. I've been trying to help Jerry for two days, an eternity in Meeseeks time, and nothing's worked. I fear the worst.

name: Meeseeks
line: Your failures are your own, old man. I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me. I say follow-through! Who's with me?! Follow-through!

name: New Meeseeks
line: I'm Mr. Meeseeks! Look at me!

name: Meeseeks
line: Kill him!

name: New Meeseeks
line: Hisssss! (He attacks another meeseeks)

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: How are you today? I'm Mr. Jelly Bean!

name: Morty
line: Hi, Mr. Jelly Bean. I'm Morty. My grandpa and I are on an adventure.

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: Nice. Is it a fun adventure?

name: Morty
line: I hope so. But I'm starting to get nervous that maybe it's gone a little too far off the rails.

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: Well, isn't that what adventures do?

name: Morty
line: Hey, you know what? You're right. Everything's going fine. I just got to relax and go with the flow.

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: Yeah. (He rubs Morty's sholders)

name: Morty
line: Okay. Uh. B-bye.

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: Uhh, no, stay. Go with the flow!

name: Morty
line: Stop. You're making me really uncomfortable.

name: Mr. Jelly Bean (aggresive)
line: Stop fighting me! Just let this happen!

name: Morty
line: Get off of me!

name: Rick
line: ♪ Sweet home Alabama. Wooooo! ♪

name: Morty
line: Whoo! No! Stop! Please!

name: Mr. Jelly Bean
line: Stop being such a fucking tease, you sweet little twat!

name: Morty
line: No! No!

name: Meeseeks
line: Everybody sto-o-o-p! Look at me! My brothers, nothing will be accomplished by shedding Meeseeks blood. None of us can die until our job is done.

name: Meeseeks *
line: The job can't be done! We'll never get two strokes off his game!

name: Meeseeks
line: No, we won't. But we will get all strokes off his game.

name: All other Meeseeks
line: Where's he going with this? What does he mean?

name: Meeseeks
line: When we kill him!

name: Beth
line: Jerry, maybe it's time I take that trip I always talk about.

name: Jerry
line: Where would you go?

name: Beth
line: I don't know, man. Italy. Greece. Argentina.

name: Jerry
line: Countries known for their sexually aggressive men. Did I tell you how much I love your new haircut?

name: Jerry
line: What the heck?

name: Meeseeks
line: There he is!

name: Beth
line: Run, Jerry!

name: Meeseeks
line: Come on out, Jerry!

name: Jerry
line: Guys, I'll choke up. I'll follow through. I'll do whatever you tell me to do, okay?

name: Meeseeks
line: Oh, we're well past that, Jerry.

name: Card Player
line: Come on, Rick, quit stalling. What do ya got?

name: Rick
line: Read 'em and weep, fellas! (Morty comes back) Oh, hey, Morty. Listen, I'm really sorry about all that stuff I said earlier about your adventure. I'm havin' a good time, Morty. It's not so bad.

name: Morty (very stressed)
line: Let's just go home, okay? I'm calling it. The adventure's over.

name: Rick
line: We can't leave now, Morty. I'm on fire!

name: Morty
line: Look, I want to leave now. You win the bet, okay? (Searches Rick's lab coat for the portal gun) Just give me the portal gun and let's go, please!

name: Morty
line: Please, I just want to... go h-home. (Tears up and holds onto Rick)

name: Rick
line: Okay. Listen, Morty. I just won a bunch of shmeckels. Why don't we use 25 of them to pay slippery stair here for a ride back to the village, and then we'll give the rest of the shmeckels to the villagers, huh?

name: Morty
line: Really?

name: Rick
line: Sure, Morty. Yeah. You know, a good adventure needs a good ending.

name: Slippery
line: Buckle up! (He starts to take them down)

name: Meeseeks (presumably 3)
line: Meeseeks are not born into this world fumbling for meaning, Jerry! We are created to serve a singular purpose for which we will go to any lengths to fulfill! Existence is pain to a Meeseeks, Jerry. And we will do anything to alleviate that pain. Just ask... (Meeseeks grabs a woman) ...what's your name, ma'am?

name: Woman
line: Samantha. Please, mister! Give him what he wants!

name: Jerry
line: Innocent people are going to die because of me. Why am I so mediocre?

name: Beth
line: Jerry, turn around. Straighten your back. Bend your knees. Bend them. Square your shoulders. Take a deep breath. I love you.

name: Meeseeks (presumably 3)
line: I'm counting to three, Jerry.

name: All Meeseeks
line: Ooooohhh!

name: Samantha
line: What the fuck is going on?

name: All Meeseeks
line: He's got it! That's a lower handicap stro-o-ke!

name: Meeseeks
line: Excuse me. I'm a bit of a stickler Meeseeks. What about your short game?

name: Samantha (Crying)
line: Oh, my God, oh, my God! What about your short

name: Meeseeks
line: Ooh, nice! (Stops existing)

name: Jerry (Kisses Beth)
line: I think we'll take our food to go.

name: Owner
line: No, you won't. The police are coming. You have so many questions to answer.

name: Jerry
line: Fair enough.

name: The First Villager
line: Thank you, kind sir. Our village is saved! You are both true heroes!

name: Rick
line: Good job, Morty. Looks like you won the bet.

name: Morty
line: Thanks, Rick, but I don't know if I should. You know, you were right about the universe. It's a crazy and chaotic place.

name: Rick
line: Well, you know, maybe that's why it could use a little cleaning up every now and then, you know. This one's wrapped up neat and clean because we did it Morty style.

name: The First Villager
line: Oh! Heroes, we would like to introduce you to our beloved king so that he may thank you personally.

name: Morty
line: Uh, no, I-it's cool. Rick. Portal. Hurry.

name: Jerry
line: So... You still thinking about taking that trip?

name: Beth
line: Jerry, look. We don't have a perfect marriage, but I'm not going anywhere. When we were in that freezer, I realized the Meeseeks are like the guys I went to high school with willing to say anything to "complete their task."

name: Jerry
line: Was I one of those guys?

name: Beth
line: The difference is you didn't disappear afterwards.

name: Jerry
line: Well... I got you pregnant.

name: Beth
line: Yeah...

name: Rick
line: What the hell happened to this place?

name: Beth
line: Uh, your Meeseeks box happened. They went crazy when they couldn't take two strokes off Jerry's golf game. He felt terrible.

name: Rick
line: Hey, it's not my fault that Jerry's an idiot.

name: Beth
line: Dad! Is there anything you can do to clean this place up?

name: Rick
line: Well, you know, I do have a Fleeseeks box.

name: Jerry
line: No. No more boxes.

name: Rick
line: What? It just has a mop and some floor wax in it. Wubba lubba dub dub! (Everyone laughs) Yeah! That's my new thing! I'm kind of like what's his name Arsenio. Isn't that it's what Arsenio used to say on his show. Wobble gobba lop bops! Right? See you next week, everybody.

name: Beth
line: I don't get it.

name: Villager 1
line: Sir, I think you're going to want to see this. We found it inside a lockbox inside king Jelly Bean's closet. (A box of pictures of many young boys Mr. Jelly Bean molested) We have to tell the people.

name: Villager 2
line: Wait. Destroy it. (They set the box on fire)
